biotools.summary: Pipeline for processing barcode sequencing data from multiplexed experiments. Applicable to any experiment in which pools of genetically barcoded cells are grown under different conditions, with the resulting barcode DNA isolated from those cells combined into one 2nd-gen sequencing run via the use of indexed PCR primers.

bioschemas.name: BEAN-counter
